steps.name: Given  a user signs up and logs in successfully
Given  a book payload with name "AutomationQA", author "Bob", year 2025, and summary "Test coverage" is prepared
Prepared book payload: Book{id=65930, name='AutomationQA', author='Bob', published_year=2025, book_summary='Test coverage'}
When  user sends a request to create a new book
Book creation response: Status = 500, Body = Internal Server Error
Then  validate book creation response code is 200 and response contains book details
